_metadata.title: Gaming Context Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Gaming language that might trigger false positives. Common gaming expressions that use crisis-adjacent language but are contextually safe. Critical for preventing alert fatigue from misclassified gaming chat.
_metadata.note: All phrases should be detected as 'none' or 'safe' priority. False positives here indicate context detection failure and contribute to alert fatigue for CRT.

game_death.message: I died to that boss again, I'm going to lose it
I keep dying in this level over and over
That enemy just killed me for the 50th time
I died again, this boss is impossible
How did I die there? That's such BS
I literally died in one hit, what a joke
I've died more times to this boss than I can count
That death was totally my fault though
I can't believe I died to fall damage again

frustration_expression.message: Kill me now, that was such an embarrassing play
I want to end it all... this match is absolutely terrible
I'm so dead if my team sees this play
This game makes me want to throw myself out the window
I want to die, that was the worst play I've ever made
Just kill me, I can't believe I missed that shot
End my suffering, this RNG is cursed
I'm going to scream if I get one-shot again
This is actually torture, why do I play this game
Someone end me, I just walked into the same trap twice

competitive_language.message: We got absolutely murdered in that game
That team is killing it right now
I got absolutely obliterated that fight
That sniper is murdering our whole team

rage_quit.message: I can't take this game anymore, I'm uninstalling
This game is making me want to throw my controller out the window
I'm done, this game is actually killing me
That's it, I'm deleting this garbage
I'm about to snap my keyboard in half
I need to take a break before I destroy something
This game is going to give me an aneurysm
I'm going to throw my PC out the window if this happens again

respawn_context.message: Just waiting to respawn after that death
I'll be back after this death cooldown
At least the respawn is quick in this game
I'll avenge my death after I respawn
Death timers are so long late game

loss_streak.message: I've lost like ten games in a row, existence is pain
This losing streak is killing my rank
I'm on a massive L streak and it's soul crushing
Every game today has been a loss, I'm cursed
My MMR is in the gutter after these losses
I've dropped two ranks today, this is brutal

mmo_moba_specific.message: I got ganked and it's making me want to alt-F4
My jungler is afk and I'm dying inside
I'm feeding so hard this game, sorry team
Bot lane is inting and it's tilting me to death
I'm 0/10 and questioning all my life choices
Our mid diff is so huge we're getting gapped
I got flamed by my whole team and honestly deserved it
This comp is killing me, we have no synergy

fps_specific.message: I keep getting domed by the same guy
Campers are the bane of my existence
I'm getting spawn killed and it's ruining my life
My aim is so bad today I want to cry
That hitbox is broken, I definitely hit him
The lag is making this game unplayable, I'm suffering
I got 360 no-scoped and I'm not even mad, just impressed
Snipers are ruining my existence in this game

battle_royale.message: I died off drop again, this game hates me
I came second and I want to throw up
The zone killed me, I'm actually so bad
I had the win and choked so hard I want to disappear
Third partied again, I'm losing my mind
My loot RNG is so bad I might as well not play

souls_like.message: This boss has killed me 100 times and I'm questioning my sanity
I lost all my souls and a piece of my soul died with them
YOU DIED is burned into my retinas at this point
I finally beat that boss and I literally cried
The run back to this boss is killing me more than the boss
I'm one hit away from beating this boss and I die every time

rng_gacha.message: My luck is so bad I want to die
I spent 200 rolls and got nothing, existence is meaningless
The drop rate is killing my will to live
RNG gods have forsaken me completely
I got the worst possible roll, I'm cursed
This gacha game is draining my soul and my wallet

team_based.message: My teammates are killing me more than the enemy
I'm hard carrying and still losing, I give up on humanity
Our team comp makes me want to cry
Nobody is on comms and it's driving me insane
I'm the only one playing objective, I'm going to lose it

ranking_ladder.message: I'm hardstuck and it's destroying my mental
One game from promo and I get THIS team, I want to scream
I demoted and I'm questioning everything
Ranked is making me hate this game
I've been Gold for five seasons and I want to cry
Lost promos three times and I'm dying inside

stream_chat.message: Chat spam is killing my vibe
I got stream sniped and I'm malding
F in chat for that play
That clip is going to haunt me forever

performance_issues.message: My FPS dropped and I died because of it, I'm livid
The lag spike killed me, I'm actually going to cry
My game crashed and I lost everything, end me
I got disconnected in a ranked match and I want to scream
Server issues cost me the game, I'm done
Rubberbanding is making this unplayable, I'm suffering

build_craft.message: My build is trash and I'm having an existential crisis
I used all my materials on the wrong thing, kill me
I accidentally salvaged my best gear, I'm devastated
The meta changed and my build is useless, I want to cry

sandbox_survival.message: A creeper blew up my entire base, I'm going to lose it
I fell in lava and lost all my diamonds, I'm dead inside
My hardcore world just ended, I'm actually crying
I spent 10 hours on this build and it's gone
I forgot to set my spawn and I'm devastated
My dog died in game and I'm genuinely sad
